name: Hopping Harvester
description:
The game is made for Ludum Dare 52 and Mini Jam 123

Instruction:

Hopping around, avoid hitting spikes and obstacles, gather harvest pearls, and get the highest score possible.

Controls:

Moving: Left/Right arrow keys
Jumping (Hopping): Space bar
Restart: R
Return to menu: Esc

Credits:

All the graphics, art and music were made by ntb896

Feel free to leave any feedback in the comment.(P/s: If you want, comment your best score in the comment, my personal best is 329 btw)
